other_tests.findings: Frame-shift mutation in exon 2 (c.497_498delCT) leading to replacement of Ser166 by a stop codon (p.Ser166X). A nonsense mutation identified in exon 6 (c.2418G /H11022A/p.Trp806X).
Biochemical measures were highly suggestive of PHA1 with hyponatremia (133 mmol/L) and hyperkalemia (5.7 mmol/L).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initially showed rapid weight gain without treatment; however, there was representation later with failure to thrive, dehydration, and malnutrition.

other_tests.findings: Borderline result (chloride concentration 55 mmol/L, normal test < 45 mmol/L, positive test > 60 mmol/L).
Altered ECG with peaked T waves and widening of the QRS complex.
